title: Executive Order 7551-Amendment of Paragraph 1, Subdivision VI, Schedule A, Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by paragraph Eight, subdivision SECOND, section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 403, 404), it is ordered that paragraph 1, Subdivision VI, Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules be, and it is hereby, amended by revoking subdivisions (c), (d), and (e) thereof, so that the paragraph, as amended, shall read as follows:
"1. (a) The Director of the Bureau of Prisons and not more than three Assistant Directors.
"(b) Members of the Board of Parole."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7551-Amendment of Paragraph 1, Subdivision VI, Schedule A, Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368941
